scripts.syncBranch: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit
scripts.commitBranch: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit'
scripts.pushBranch: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.firstDeploy: npm run pagesBranch && npm run syncBranch && npm run build && npm run commitBranch && npm run pushBranch && npm run mainBranch
scripts.deploy: npm run syncBranch && npm run build && npm run commitBranch && npm run pushBranch && npm run mainBranch
